title: AE插件：三维星球特效插件VideoCopilot ORB Win/Mac + AK第168期使用教程/6K地图贴图
author: 大众脸
content: VideoCopilot 推出的免费三维星球特效插件 ORB，可创建真实行星效果。支持颜色设置、大气层、贴图、反射、环境、灯光、阴影等参数调节，并具备GPU加速功能。适用于 After Effects CS6 至 CC 2018，支持 Windows 与 Mac 系统。插件提供物理渲染、环境反射、运动模糊、高级UV设置、亮度阴影遮罩、昼夜切换、基于亮度调节、内置灯光控制、360全景渲染及无限星空背景等功能。

other.description_en: Video Copilot has announced a new plugin for After Effects called Orb. It started life as a simple replacement for CC Sphere but has become a complete generator for generating 3D planets including physically based shaders, the ability to design the atmosphere, custom terrain bump maps, environment reflections, automatic shadow illumination, GPU acceleration and more.
